summary: The LIHEAP Parity Act (S. 1700) amends the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Act of 1981 to change the formula for allocating funds to states. The bill focuses on modifying the existing allotment process and mandates the Secretary of Health and Human Services to create a regulation detailing the calculation method. This regulation must specify data sources for state allotments and outline the frequency and method of data updates to maintain accuracy.
